title: Teardown of an Apple AirTag 2 With Die Shots
full_text: Teardown of an Apple AirTag 2 With Die Shots. There are a few possible ways to do a teardown of new electronics like the Apple AirTag 2 tracker, with [electronupdate] opting to go down to the silicon level, with die shots of the major ICs in a….
